title: League Servers Down?
body:
League just suddenly disconnected and now cannot reconnect?

[(http://tinypic.com/r/24zeu0o/9)]

replies.body: There were some temporary login service issues that have since been resolved. There was a message about it posted to the [**Service Status Page**](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/) during the incident. If you're still experiencing this issue, please let me know.

Here is what worked for me I used the hextech repair tool from the support page the client pushes you towards I downloaded the application then ran it on the settings it started with and I was able to login

I'll repost if I encounter any further issues {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Having the same issue and this is the first login for the day the only thing I did was try to launch legacy client and that didn't work so now I'm stuck with this 
please halp
People on twitch r still in games i just wanna play wtf man{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}
Central NY also getting this, trying to reconnect can't get into client.

What in the world. Run the little tool it points us to and I can get in for a split second then get reconnect buttons. Then I have to run the tool again to even get past password. Soooooo I wanna ranked please.
ayyy we all in the same boat at least FeelsGoodMan
I have the same thing here
Yeah, I got booted off and I'm stuck at "trying to reconnect" on the login screen
Yeah that's what's happening to me too. It was out of nowhere. I was fine, my internet is fine, and I'm able to do things, but I guess league just doesn't want to work.
